summary: Yorgos is released from prison after 14 years of incarceration for a murder he committed. He meets Strella, a young transsexual sex worker. They spend the night together and soon they fall in love. But the past is catching up with Yorgos.
cast: Mina Orfanou|Yannis Kokiasmenos|Minos Theoharis|Argyris Kavidas|Akis Ioannou|Konstantinos Siradakis|Konstadinos Aspiotis|Mania Lembesi|Ivan Svitailo|Mani Toumbou|Giorgos Mazis|Betty Vakalidou|Tasos Antoniou|Loukas Arvanitidis|Andreas Asimakopoulos|Jeff Asimakopoulos|Babis Bakirtzoglou|Yvonni Benetou|Mary Bountouri|Stephanie Capetanides|Giannis Daremas|Takis Dimopoulos|Giorgos Drakidis|Nandia Eleftheriou|Giorgos Fakarellis|Alexandros Fragos|Tasos Gkouvatsos|Alexis Hronopoulos|Andreas Ioannidis|Mihalis Karagiannis|Athena Katsibardis|Giorgos Kelefis|Konstadis Kokkiasmenos|Eva Koumarianou|Anna Kouroupou|Giorgos Krassakopoulos|Haris Legantis|Poly Lykourgou|Jenny Lymberaki|Markela Maltezou|Andreas Manolioudakis|Marilou|Marina Marinou|Zacharias Mavroeidis|Giorgos Nousias|Giannis Panagiotou|Olympia Spanou|Nikos Thomas|Sotiris Vantarakis|Iosif Vardakis|Kostas Vasileiadis|Giannis Vasilopoulos|Panos Xaxiris
title: Strella
